channel.title: Player rights
channel.description:
Ok, I really don't get the <, >=, <, and the other ones, I think that is all? If there is more, please tell me about them.
Ok, I dont get these things like > 0 or something.
What do they mean?

item.title: Player rights
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“moparwha, post:4, topic:250298”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=330097.msg2579164#msg2579164 date=1229146964]

Greater than
< Less than
= Greater than or equal to
<= Less than or equal to
!= Doesn’t equal
== Equals
[/quote]

So Rich is saying if.

playerRights > 0 Mods, Admins and Owners Can do it
playerRights < 1 Only Players can do it
playerRights >= 1 Mods, Admins and Owners Can Do it
playerRights <= 1 Mods, and players can do it
(!muted) Not Muted
== Mute; Muted.[/quote]
or
if mute = 1;

Read full topic

<= Less than or equal to

[/quote]

So Rich is saying if.

playerRights > 0 Mods, Admins and Owners Can do it
playerRights < 1 Only Players can do it

== Mute; Muted.[/quote]actually anyways you kinda got it wrong find out where yourself

Ok, thank you everybody! I got it now!

item.title: Player rights
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

Rich explained it well enough, you don’t need to add on to it, and he’s only talking about operators, not a boolean; and your “== Mute” would cause an error.

Read full topic

[quote="`Rich, post:3, topic:250298"]> Greater than
< Less than

= Greater than or equal to
<= Less than or equal to
!= Doesn’t equal
== Equals[/quote]

So Rich is saying if.

playerRights > 0 Mods, Admins and Owners Can do it
playerRights < 1 Only Players can do it
playerRights >= 1 Mods, Admins and Owners Can Do it
playerRights <= 1 Mods, and players can do it
(!muted) Not Muted
== Mute; Muted.

item.title: Player rights
item.dc:creator: @oceano1 oceano1
item.description:
@oceano1 wrote:

welll if you have something like ifPlayerRights = 1 it would mean if your players right equals 1 (a mod) you can do whatever is in the rest of the code if its <0 means greater than a normal player and >3 means everything less than owner rights hope i helped
